mapper.select: SELECT /* panavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.selectPaGoodsImage by PaNaverGoodsController-goodsImageSelect */ PG.GOODS_CODE , 'http:'||FUN_GETCONFIG('IMG_SERVER_1_URL') AS IMAGE_URL_1 , GI.IMAGE_URL AS IMAGE_URL_2 , GI.IMAGE_G AS IMAGE_P , GI.IMAGE_AG AS IMAGE_AP , GI.IMAGE_BG AS IMAGE_BP , GI.IMAGE_CG AS IMAGE_CP , GI.IMAGE_DG AS IMAGE_DP , PG.LAST_SYNC_DATE , NVL(( SELECT '1' FROM TPANAVERGOODSIMAGE PNG WHERE PNG.GOODS_CODE = PG.GOODS_CODE ),'0') AS NAVER_IMAGE_YN FROM TPAGOODSIMAGE PG ,TGOODSIMAGE GI WHERE PG.GOODS_CODE = #{paGoodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PG.PA_GROUP_CODE = #{paGroupCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GI.GOODS_CODE = PG.GOODS_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TPANAVERGOODSIMAGE /* panavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.insertPaNaverGoodsImage by PaNaverGoodsController-goodsImageInsert */ ( GOODS_CODE, IMAGE_NAVER_P, IMAGE_NAVER_AP, IMAGE_NAVER_BP, IMAGE_NAVER_CP, IMAGE_NAVER_DP, LAST_SYNC_DATE, INSERT_ID, INSERT_DATE, MODIFY_ID, MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageNaverP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageNaverAp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageNaverBp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageNaverCp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageNaverDp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastSyncDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{insertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=DATE} )
mapper.select: SELECT /* panavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.selectPaNaverGoodsImage by PaNaverGoodsController-goodsTrans */ PNG.GOODS_CODE, PNG.IMAGE_NAVER_P, PNG.IMAGE_NAVER_AP, PNG.IMAGE_NAVER_BP, PNG.IMAGE_NAVER_CP, PNG.IMAGE_NAVER_DP FROM TPANAVERGOODSIMAGE PNG WHERE PNG.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS ( SELECT '1' FROM TPAGOODSIMAGE PG WHERE PNG.GOODS_CODE = PG.GOODS_CODE AND PG.PA_GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PG.TRANS_TARGET_YN = '0' AND PG.LAST_SYNC_DATE = PNG.LAST_SYNC_DATE )

SELECT /* panavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.selectPaNaverGoodsInfoList by PaNaverGoodsController-goodsTrans */ * FROM( SELECT TG.GOODS_CODE , TG.SALE_GB , TG.GOODS_NAME AS PA_GOODS_NAME , PNG.PA_CODE , PNG.PA_GROUP_CODE , TG.ENTP_CODE , TG.TERM_ORDER_QTY , TG.CUST_ORD_QTY_CHECK_YN , PG.SALE_START_DATE , PG.SALE_END_DATE , GAI.ORDER_CREATE_YN AS ORDER_MAKE_YN , TG.MIXPACK_YN , PNG.PRODUCT_ID , CASE WHEN NVL(CEIL(FUN_GET_ORDER_ABLE_QTY(PNG.GOODS_CODE,'%', TG.WH_CODE) * TC2.CODE_GROUP), 0) > 9999999 THEN 9999999 ELSE NVL(CEIL(FUN_GET_ORDER_ABLE_QTY(PNG.GOODS_CODE,'%', TG.WH_CODE) * TC2.CODE_GROUP), 0) END AS TRANS_ORDER_ABLE_QTY , PNG.PA_STATUS , PNG.PA_LMSD_KEY , PNG.PA_SALE_GB , '03' AS NAVER_ORIGIN_CODE , PG.ORIGIN_NAME , PG.BRAND_NAME , PG.TAX_YN , PG.TAX_SMALL_YN , PG.ADULT_YN , PG.ORDER_MIN_QTY , PG.ORDER_MAX_QTY , PG.CUST_ORD_QTY_CHECK_TERM , PG.DO_NOT_ISLAND_DELY_YN , PNGI.IMAGE_NAVER_P , PNGI.IMAGE_NAVER_AP , PNGI.IMAGE_NAVER_BP , PNGI.IMAGE_NAVER_CP , PNGI.IMAGE_NAVER_DP , PP.APPLY_DATE , PP.SALE_PRICE , PP.DC_AMT , PC.ENTP_CODE AS SHIP_ENTP_CODE , PC.SHIP_COST_CODE , PC.ORD_COST , PC.RETURN_COST , PC.CHANGE_COST , PC.SHIP_COST_BASE_AMT , PC.JEJU_COST , PC.ISLAND_COST , TG.LMSD_CODE , TG.INSTALL_YN , GAI.ORDER_CREATE_YN , TM.MAKECO_CODE , TM.MAKECO_NAME , TC1.CODE_NAME AS CS_TEL , TC1.REMARK AS CS_DETAIL , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TPAGOODSDTMAPPING PGT WHERE PG.GOODS_CODE = PGT.GOODS_CODE AND PGT.PA_CODE = '41' ) GOODSDT_CNT , ( SELECT PKI.EXCEPT_CODE FROM TPANAVERGOODSKINDSINFO PKI WHERE PNG.PA_LMSD_KEY = PKI.CATEGORY_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) AS EXCEPT_CODE , PNG.MODIFY_DATE , DECODE(PNG.PRODUCT_ID,'','1','2') AS SORT_SEQ , PP.LUMP_SUM_DC_AMT , PP.LUMP_SUM_OWN_DC_AMT , PP.LUMP_SUM_ENTP_DC_AMT , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TCODE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_LGROUP = 'O507' AND C1.CODE_MGROUP = '05') AS TOP_IMAGE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TCODE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_LGROUP = 'O507' AND C1.CODE_MGROUP = PNG.PA_CODE) AS BOTTOM_IMAGE , NVL( (SELECT REPLACE (DS.DESCRIBE_EXT, chr(10), '') FROM TDESCRIBE DS WHERE DS.DESCRIBE_CODE ='998' AND DS.GOODS_CODE = TG.GOODS_CODE), (SELECT DECODE(DS.WEB_FLAG, '1', REPLACE(DS.DESCRIBE_EXT, chr(10), ''), DS.DESCRIBE_NOTE) FROM TDESCRIBE DS WHERE DS.DESCRIBE_CODE ='999' AND DS.GOODS_CODE = TG.GOODS_CODE) ) AS DESCRIBE_EXT , DECODE(TG.COLLECT_YN,'0','',(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TCODE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_LGROUP = 'O507' AND C1.CODE_MGROUP = '99')) AS COLLECT_IMAGE , TG.COLLECT_YN , NVL((SELECT TSB.DESCRIBE_NOTE FROM TDESCRIBE TSB WHERE TSB.DESCRIBE_CODE = '200' AND TSB.GOODS_CODE = PNG.GOODS_CODE), '') AS GOODS_COM , NVL((SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (TNM IDX_TPANOTICEM_03)*/ TNM.NOTICE_EXT FROM TPANOTICEM TNM , TPANOTICETARGET TNT , TPANOTICEAPPLY TNA WHERE TNM.NOTICE_NO = TNT.NOTICE_NO AND TNT.GOODS_CODE = TG.GOODS_CODE AND TNM.USE_CODE = '00' AND INSTR(TNM.PA_GROUP_CODE, PNG.PA_GROUP_CODE) > 0 AND TNT.NOTICE_NO = TNA.NOTICE_NO AND TNT.GOODS_CODE = TNA.GOODS_CODE AND TNA.PA_GROUP_CODE = PNG.PA_GROUP_CODE AND ROWNUM = 1), '') AS NOTICE_EXT , (SELECT COUNT(TEC.GOODS_CODE) FROM TPANAVEREXCEPTCERT TEC WHERE TEC.GOODS_CODE = TG.GOODS_CODE AND TEC.CERT_YN = '1') AS EXCEPT_YN , PNG.MODEL_ID AS MODEL_NO FROM TPANAVERGOODS PNG , TGOODSADDINFO GAI , TPAPRODUCT PG , TPAGOODSPRICE PP , TMAKECOMP TM , TPANAVERGOODSIMAGE PNGI , TGOODS TG , TPACUSTSHIPCOST PC , TCODE TC1 , TCODE TC2 WHERE PNG.PA_CODE = '41' AND PNG.GOODS_CODE = GAI.GOODS_CODE AND PNG.GOODS_CODE = PG.GOODS_CODE AND PNG.GOODS_CODE = PP.GOODS_CODE AND PG.MAKECO_CODE = TM.MAKECO_CODE AND PNG.GOODS_CODE = PNGI.GOODS_CODE(+) AND PNG.GOODS_CODE = TG.GOODS_CODE AND PNG.PA_CODE = PC.PA_CODE AND PC.ENTP_CODE = DECODE(TG.DELY_TYPE,'10','100001',PG.ENTP_CODE) AND PC.SHIP_COST_CODE = PG.SHIP_COST_CODE AND TC1.CODE_LGROUP = 'O509' AND TC1.CODE_MGROUP = PNG.PA_CODE AND TC2.CODE_LGROUP = 'O505' AND TC2.CODE_MGROUP = PNG.PA_CODE
AND PNG.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND PNG.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND PNG.PA_STATUS IN ('10','20')
AND PNG.PA_SALE_GB = '20' AND PNG.PA_STATUS = '30' AND PNG.TRANS_TARGET_YN = '1'
AND ((PNG.PA_STATUS = '10') OR (PNG.PA_SALE_GB = '20' AND PNG.PA_STATUS = '30' AND PNG.TRANS_TARGET_YN = '1'))
AND 1=2
AND PG.SALE_GB != '19' AND TG.INVI_GOODS_TYPE = '00' AND PP.ROWID = (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (GP PK_TPAGOODSPRICE)*/ GP.ROWID FROM TPAGOODSPRICE GP WHERE GP.GOODS_CODE = PNG.GOODS_CODE AND GP.PA_CODE = PNG.PA_CODE AND GP.APPLY_DATE < SYSDATE AND ROWNUM =1 ) AND TG.ENTP_CODE NOT IN (SELECT TC.CODE_MGROUP FROM TCODE TC WHERE TC.CODE_LGROUP = 'T001' AND INSTR(TC.CODE_GROUP, PNG.PA_GROUP_CODE) > 0 ) ORDER BY SORT_SEQ , MODIFY_DATE ) X WHERE ROWNUM <= 500

SELECT /* panavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.selectGoodsSellModifyAllObjectList by PaNaverGoodsController-changeProductSaleStatusAllObject */ TG.GOODS_CODE , PNG.PA_CODE , PNG.PRODUCT_ID , CASE WHEN NVL(CEIL(FUN_GET_ORDER_ABLE_QTY(PNG.GOODS_CODE,'%', TG.WH_CODE) * TC.CODE_GROUP), 0) > 9999999 THEN 9999999 ELSE NVL(CEIL(FUN_GET_ORDER_ABLE_QTY(PNG.GOODS_CODE,'%', TG.WH_CODE) * TC.CODE_GROUP), 0) END AS TRANS_ORDER_ABLE_QTY , PNG.PA_STATUS , PNG.PA_SALE_GB , TG.SALE_GB , PNG.TRANS_SALE_YN FROM TPANAVERGOODS PNG , TPAPRODUCT PG , TGOODS TG , TCODE TC WHERE PNG.GOODS_CODE = PG.GOODS_CODE AND PNG.GOODS_CODE = TG.GOODS_CODE AND TC.CODE_LGROUP = 'O505' AND TC.CODE_MGROUP = PNG.PA_CODE AND PNG.PA_STATUS = '30' AND PNG.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PNG.TRANS_SALE_YN = 1

SELECT /* panavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.selectPaNaverGoodsdtInfoList by PaNaverGoodsController-goodsTrans */ PD.GOODS_CODE , DM.PA_CODE , PD.GOODSDT_CODE , PD.GOODSDT_INFO , PD.GOODSDT_INFO_KIND , CASE WHEN NVL(DECODE(DT.SALE_GB, '00', CEIL(FUN_GET_ORDER_ABLE_QTY(PD.GOODS_CODE, PD.GOODSDT_CODE, GD.WH_CODE) * TC.CODE_GROUP), 0), 0) > 9999999 THEN 9999999 ELSE NVL(DECODE(DT.SALE_GB, '00', CEIL(FUN_GET_ORDER_ABLE_QTY(PD.GOODS_CODE, PD.GOODSDT_CODE, GD.WH_CODE) * TC.CODE_GROUP), 0), 0) END AS TRANS_ORDER_ABLE_QTY , PD.SORT_TYPE , NVL(DM.PA_OPTION_CODE, PD.GOODS_CODE||PD.GOODSDT_CODE||DM.PA_CODE) AS PA_OPTION_CODE FROM TPAPRODUCTOPTION PD , TPAGOODSDTMAPPING DM , TGOODS GD , TCODE TC , TGOODSDT DT WHERE PD.GOODS_CODE = DM.GOODS_CODE AND PD.GOODSDT_CODE = DM.GOODSDT_CODE AND PD.GOODS_CODE = GD.GOODS_CODE AND TC.CODE_LGROUP = 'O505' AND TC.CODE_MGROUP = DM.PA_CODE AND DM.TRANS_TARGET_YN = '1' AND DT.GOODS_CODE = PD.GOODS_CODE AND DT.GOODSDT_CODE = PD.GOODSDT_CODE AND DM.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GD.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY PD.GOODS_CODE , PD.GOODSDT_CODE
mapper.update: UPDATE TPAGOODSTARGET PGT /* panavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.updatePaGoodsTarget by PaNaverGoodsController-goodsTrans */ SET PGT.PA_GOODS_CODE = #{productId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PGT.PA_SALE_GB = #{paSaleGb, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PGT.MODIFY_ID = #{modifyId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PGT.MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE PGT.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PGT.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PGT.PA_GOODS_CODE IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT /* panavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.selectPaNaverGoodsdtMappingList by PaNaverGoodsController-goodsdtModify */ PGT.GOODS_CODE ,PGT.GOODSDT_CODE ,PGT.GOODSDT_INFO ,PGT.GOODSDT_INFO_KIND ,PGT.SORT_TYPE ,PGT.INSERT_ID ,PGT.INSERT_DATE ,PGT.MODIFY_ID ,PGT.MODIFY_DATE ,PGT.SALE_GB ,NVL(DECODE(DT.SALE_GB, '00', CEIL(FUN_GET_ORDER_ABLE_QTY(PGT.GOODS_CODE, PGT.GOODSDT_CODE, GD.WH_CODE) * TC.CODE_GROUP), 0), 0) AS TRANS_ORDER_ABLE_QTY ,PG.PRODUCT_ID AS PA_GOODS_CODE ,PGT.SALE_GB ,PM.PA_CODE FROM TPAPRODUCTOPTION PGT , TPAGOODSDTMAPPING PM , TPANAVERGOODS PG , TGOODS GD , TCODE TC , TGOODSDT DT WHERE PGT.GOODS_CODE = PM.GOODS_CODE AND PGT.GOODSDT_CODE = PM.GOODSDT_CODE AND PM.GOODS_CODE = PG.GOODS_CODE AND PM.PA_CODE = PG.PA_CODE AND GD.GOODS_CODE = PG.GOODS_CODE AND TC.CODE_LGROUP = 'O505' AND TC.CODE_MGROUP = PG.PA_CODE AND PGT.GOODS_CODE = DT.GOODS_CODE AND PGT.GOODSDT_CODE = DT.GOODSDT_CODE AND DT.SALE_GB = '00' AND PM.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.GOODS_CODE = #{paGoodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY PM.GOODS_CODE, PM.GOODSDT_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TPAMONITERING /* panavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.insertStopMonitering by paNaverGoods-stop */ ( MONITERING_SEQ ,CHECK_GB ,CHECK_NO ,CHECK_TXT ,GOODS_CODE ,PA_GOODS_CODE ,INSERT_DATE ,INSERT_ID ,MODIFY_DATE ,MODIFY_ID ) VALUES (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LTRIM(TO_CHAR(SEQ_PA_MONITERING_SEQ.NEXTVAL, '000000')) ,'40' ,#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'중복중단 처리프로세스' ,#{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{productNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,SYSDATE ,'999999' ,SYSDATE ,'999999' )
mapper.select: SELECT /* panaver.xml : panaver.panavergoods.selectGoodsPriceInfoByGoodsCode */ P.GOODS_CODE , P.PA_CODE , P.APPLY_DATE , P.TRANS_ID , P.TRANS_DATE , P.SALE_PRICE , P.SUPPLY_PRICE , P.COMMISION , P.DC_AMT , P.INSERT_ID , P.INSERT_DATE , P.MODIFY_ID , P.MODIFY_DATE , P.PRICE_SEQ , P.SUPPLY_SEQ FROM TPAGOODSPRICE P WHERE (P.PA_CODE = '41' OR P.PA_CODE = '42') AND P.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND P.APPLY_DATE >= ( SELECT MAX(GP.APPLY_DATE) FROM TPAGOODSPRICE GP WHERE GP.GOODS_CODE = P.GOODS_CODE AND GP.PA_CODE = P.PA_CODE AND GP.TRANS_DATE IS NOT NULL )

mapper.update: UPDATE /* panavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.savePaGoodsPriceTx by PaNaverGoodsController-goodsTrans */ TPAGOODSPRICE T SET T.TRANS_ID = #{siteGb, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.TRANS_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE T.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.TRANS_DATE IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT /* paNavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.selectPaCertificationList by PaNaverGoodsController-goodsTrans */ PNC.CATEGORY_ID , PNC.EXCEPT_CODE , PNC.CERTI_CODE , PNCI.CERTI_COMPANY_YN , PNC.CERTI_COMPANY , PNCI.CERTI_NO_YN , TRIM(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(GK.KC_NO, chr(9), '') , chr(10), ''), chr(13), '')) AS CERTI_NO , PNCI.CERTI_AGENCY_YN , PNC.CERTI_AGENCY FROM TPANAVERGOODSKINDSINFO PNC , TPANAVERGOODSKINDSCERTIINFO PNCI , TGOODSKCINFO GK , TPANAVERGOODS PG WHERE PNC.CERTI_CODE = PNCI.CERTI_CODE AND PG.GOODS_CODE = GK.GOODS_CODE AND PG.PA_LMSD_KEY = PNC.CATEGORY_ID AND PG.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PG.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT /* paNavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.selectPaDelivery by PaNaverGoodsController-goodsTrans */ NVL(( SELECT PE.PA_ADDR_SEQ FROM TPAENTPSLIP PE WHERE PE.ENTP_CODE = DECODE(GD.DELY_TYPE,'10','100001',PG.ENTP_CODE) AND PE.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = DECODE(GD.DELY_TYPE,'10','003',PG.SHIP_MAN_SEQ) AND PE.PA_CODE = PNG.PA_CODE ),'0') AS SHIPPING_ADDRESS_ID , NVL(( SELECT PE.PA_ADDR_SEQ FROM TPAENTPSLIP PE WHERE PE.ENTP_CODE = DECODE(GD.DELY_TYPE,'10','100001',PG.ENTP_CODE) AND PE.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = DECODE(GD.DELY_TYPE,'10','002',PG.RETURN_MAN_SEQ) AND PE.PA_CODE = PNG.PA_CODE ),'0') AS RETURN_ADDRESS_ID , NVL(( SELECT PD.PA_DELY_GB FROM TPADELYGB PD , TENTERPRISE TE WHERE PD.PA_CODE = '04' AND PD.DELY_GB = TE.DELY_GB AND TE.ENTP_CODE = GD.ENTP_CODE), 'CH1') AS PA_DELY_GB FROM TPAPRODUCT PG , TPANAVERGOODS PNG , TGOODS GD WHERE PG.GOODS_CODE = PNG.GOODS_CODE AND PG.GOODS_CODE = GD.GOODS_CODE AND PNG.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PG.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE TPANAVERGOODS TPG /* paNavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.updatePaGoodsModifyFail by PaNaverGoodsController */ SET TPG.RETURN_NOTE = #{returnNote, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPG.PA_SALE_GB = #{paSaleGb, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPG.TRANS_SALE_YN = '1', TPG.MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE, TPG.MODIFY_ID = 'PANAVER' WHERE TPG.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TPG.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TPASALENOGOODS /* paNavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.insertPaSaleNoGoods by PaNaverGoodsController */ (PA_GROUP_CODE, PA_CODE, GOODS_CODE, SEQ_NO, PA_GOODS_CODE, PA_SALE_GB, INSERT_ID, INSERT_DATE, NOTE) VALUES (#{paGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paSaleGb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO TPAGOODSAUTHYNLOG /* paNavergoods.xml : paNaver.paNavergoods.insertPaGoodsAuthYnLog by PaNaverGoodsController */ (PA_GROUP_CODE, PA_CODE, GOODS_CODE, SEQ_NO, AUTO_YN, INSERT_ID, INSERT_DATE, NOTE) VALUES (#{paGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{autoYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT /* panavergoods.xml : panaver.panavergoods.selectPaPromoDeleteTarget by PaNaverGoodsController */ /*+INDEX_DESC (PPMT IDX_TPAPROMOTARGET_02)*/ PPMT.PROC_GB , PPMT.PROMO_NO , PPMT.PA_CODE , PPMT.GOODS_CODE , PPMT.SEQ , TO_CHAR(PPMT.TRANS_DATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss') AS TRANS_DATE , PPMT.DO_AMT AS DO_COST , PPMT.AMT_RATE_FLAG , PPMT.OWN_COST AS DO_OWN_COST , PPMT.ENTP_COST AS DO_ENTP_COST , PPMT.DO_RATE , PPMT.DO_AMT , PPMT.STANDARD_APP_AMT , PPMT.LIMIT_AMT , PPMT.ENTP_COST , PPMT.INSERT_DATE , PM.ALCOUT_PROMO_YN FROM TPAPROMOTARGET PPMT , TPROMOM PM WHERE PPMT.PROC_GB = 'D' AND PPMT.TRANS_DATE IS NULL AND PPMT.PROMO_NO = PM.PROMO_NO AND PM.COUPON_YN = '1' AND PM.IMMEDIATELY_YN = '1' AND NVL(PM.ALCOUT_PROMO_YN, '0') = #{alcoutPromoYn , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PPMT.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PPMT.PA_CODE = #{paCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS ( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC (PPMT3 IDX_TPAPROMOTARGET_04)*/ 'X' FROM TPAPROMOTARGET PPMT3 WHERE PPMT3.PROMO_NO = PPMT.PROMO_NO AND PPMT3.PA_CODE = PPMT.PA_CODE AND PPMT3.GOODS_CODE = PPMT.GOODS_CODE AND PPMT3.INSERT_DATE < PPMT.INSERT_DATE AND PPMT3.TRANS_DATE IS NOT NULL AND PPMT3.PROC_GB != 'D' AND PPMT3.DO_AMT > 0 AND ROWNUM = 1) AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* panavergoods.xml: panaver.panavergoods.insertPaPromoTarget by PaNaverGoodsController */ TPAPROMOTARGET PPMT (PPMT.PROMO_NO , PPMT.PA_CODE , PPMT.GOODS_CODE , PPMT.SEQ , PPMT.DO_TYPE , PPMT.COUPON_YN , PPMT.IMMEDIATELY_YN , PPMT.PROMO_BDATE , PPMT.PROMO_EDATE , PPMT.AMT_RATE_FLAG , PPMT.DO_RATE , PPMT.DO_AMT , PPMT.STANDARD_APP_AMT , PPMT.LIMIT_AMT , PPMT.USE_CODE , PPMT.OWN_COST , PPMT.ENTP_COST , PPMT.INSERT_ID , PPMT.MODIFY_ID , PPMT.PROC_GB , PPMT.PA_GROUP_CODE , PPMT.TRANS_DATE , PPMT.INSERT_DATE , PPMT.MODIFY_DATE , PPMT.DO_COST , PPMT.DO_OWN_COST , PPMT.DO_ENTP_COST , PPMT.EXCEPT_REASON ) SELECT PM.PROMO_NO , PM.PA_CODE , PM.GOODS_CODE , LPAD((SELECT MAX(PM1.SEQ) + 1 FROM TPAPROMOTARGET PM1 WHERE PM1.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM1.PA_CODE = #{paCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM1.PROMO_NO = #{promoNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} ), 4 ,'0') , PM.DO_TYPE , PM.COUPON_YN , PM.IMMEDIATELY_YN , PM.PROMO_BDATE , PM.PROMO_EDATE , PM.AMT_RATE_FLAG , PM.DO_RATE , DECODE(#{doCost, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 0 , 0 , PM.DO_AMT) , PM.STANDARD_APP_AMT , PM.LIMIT_AMT , PM.USE_CODE , DECODE(#{doCost, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 0 , 0 , PM.OWN_COST) , DECODE(#{doCost, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 0 , 0 , PM.ENTP_COST) , PM.INSERT_ID , 'BATCH' , DECODE(PM.PROC_GB, 'I', 'U', PM.PROC_GB) , PM.PA_GROUP_CODE , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DECODE(#{doCost, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 0 , 0 , PM.DO_COST) , DECODE(#{doCost, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 0 , 0 , PM.DO_OWN_COST) , DECODE(#{doCost, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 0 , 0 , PM.DO_ENTP_COST) , DECODE(#{doCost, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 0 , '마진률 초과 , 연동 예외 시간 : ' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') FROM TPAPROMOTARGET PM WHERE PM.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_CODE = #{paCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PROMO_NO = #{promoNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.SEQ = #{seq , jdbcType=VARCHAR}

INSERT INTO /* panavergoods.xml: panaver.panavergoods.insertPaPromoTarget by PaNaverGoodsController */ TPAPROMOTARGET PPMT (PPMT.PROMO_NO , PPMT.PA_CODE , PPMT.GOODS_CODE , PPMT.SEQ , PPMT.DO_TYPE , PPMT.COUPON_YN , PPMT.IMMEDIATELY_YN , PPMT.PROMO_BDATE , PPMT.PROMO_EDATE , PPMT.AMT_RATE_FLAG , PPMT.DO_RATE , PPMT.DO_AMT , PPMT.STANDARD_APP_AMT , PPMT.LIMIT_AMT , PPMT.USE_CODE , PPMT.OWN_COST , PPMT.ENTP_COST , PPMT.INSERT_ID , PPMT.MODIFY_ID , PPMT.PROC_GB , PPMT.PA_GROUP_CODE , PPMT.TRANS_DATE , PPMT.INSERT_DATE , PPMT.MODIFY_DATE , PPMT.DO_COST , PPMT.DO_OWN_COST , PPMT.DO_ENTP_COST ) SELECT PM.PROMO_NO , PM.PA_CODE , PM.GOODS_CODE , LPAD((SELECT MAX(PM1.SEQ) + 1 FROM TPAPROMOTARGET PM1 WHERE PM1.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM1.PA_CODE = #{paCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM1.PROMO_NO = #{promoNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} ), 4 ,'0') , PM.DO_TYPE , PM.COUPON_YN , PM.IMMEDIATELY_YN , PM.PROMO_BDATE , PM.PROMO_EDATE , PM.AMT_RATE_FLAG , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , PM.USE_CODE , 0 , 0 , PM.INSERT_ID , 'BATCH' , 'D' , PM.PA_GROUP_CODE , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , 0 , 0 , 0 FROM TPAPROMOTARGET PM WHERE PM.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PA_CODE = #{paCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.PROMO_NO = #{promoNo , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PM.SEQ = #{seq , jdbcType=VARCHAR}
